entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
